includedAssets.title: A Hard Day's Night
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep1 - A Hard Day's Night
includedAssets.synopsis: As they begin a demanding residency programme, Meredith Grey and four other first-year surgical interns try to balance life and work at Seattle Grace Hospital.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As they begin a demanding residency programme, Meredith Grey and four other first-year surgical interns try to balance life and work.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As they begin a demanding residency programme, Meredith Grey and four other first-year surgical interns try to balance life and work at Seattle Grace Hospital.

includedAssets.title: The First Cut is the Deepest
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep2 - The First Cut is the Deepest
includedAssets.synopsis: A young woman clings to life after a brutal attack. Meanwhile, Meredith puts her career on the line to save a newborn in the hospital nursery.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A young woman clings to life after a brutal attack. Meanwhile, Meredith puts her career on the line to save a newborn in the hospital nursery.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A young woman clings to life after a brutal attack. Meanwhile, Meredith puts her career on the line to save a newborn in the hospital nursery.

includedAssets.title: Winning A Battle, Losing The War
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - Winning A Battle, Losing The War
includedAssets.synopsis: The interns compete to treat the most severe injuries when the emergency room is flooded with patients following a bike race in Seattle.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The interns compete to treat the most severe injuries when the emergency room is flooded with patients following a bike race in Seattle.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The interns compete to treat the most severe injuries when the emergency room is flooded with patients following a bike race in Seattle.

includedAssets.title: No Man's Land
includedAssets.synopsis: Cristina's encounter with a former nurse, now a patient at Seattle Grace, changes her forever. Izzie becomes the subject of hospital gossip.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cristina's encounter with a former nurse, now a patient at Seattle Grace, changes her forever. Izzie becomes the subject of hospital gossip.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Cristina's encounter with a former nurse, now a patient at Seattle Grace, changes her forever. Izzie becomes the subject of hospital gossip.

includedAssets.title: Shake Your Groove Thing
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep5 - Shake Your Groove Thing
includedAssets.synopsis: Meredith worries that she may have made a mistake during surgery that has endangered her career. Meanwhile, Izzie's plans to throw a party go awry.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Meredith worries that she may have made a mistake during surgery that has endangered her career. Meanwhile, Izzie's plans to throw a party go awry.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Meredith worries that she may have made a mistake during surgery that has endangered her career. Meanwhile, Izzie's plans to throw a party go awry.

includedAssets.title: If Tomorrow Never Comes
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep6 - If Tomorrow Never Comes
includedAssets.synopsis: Alex works hard to gain the trust of Annie, a shy patient with a huge tumour, only to make a fool of himself in front of her later.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Alex works hard to gain the trust of Annie, a shy patient with a huge tumour, only to make a fool of himself in front of her later.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Alex works hard to gain the trust of Annie, a shy patient with a huge tumour, only to make a fool of himself in front of her later.

includedAssets.title: The Self Destruct Button
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep7 - The Self Destruct Button
includedAssets.synopsis: While Derek and Meredith try to be discreet after spending the night together, George is reluctant to voice his suspicions about a colleague.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Derek and Meredith try to be discreet after spending the night together, George is reluctant to voice his suspicions about a colleague.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Derek and Meredith try to be discreet after spending the night together, George is reluctant to voice his suspicions about a colleague.

includedAssets.title: Save Me
includedAssets.synopsis: Meredith grows dissatisfied with the mystery surrounding parts of Derek's life and Alex treats a patient whose religious beliefs jeopardise her chances of recovery.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Meredith grows dissatisfied with the mystery surrounding parts of Derek's life and Alex treats a patient whose beliefs jeopardise her recovery.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Meredith grows dissatisfied with the mystery surrounding parts of Derek's life and Alex treats a patient whose religious beliefs jeopardise her chances of recovery.

includedAssets.title: Who's Zoomin Who?
includedAssets.synopsis: In the season one finale, the outbreak of a sexually transmitted disease affects some hospital staff. As Meredith and Derek grow closer, a bombshell is dropped.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The outbreak of a sexually transmitted disease affects some hospital staff. As Meredith and Derek grow closer, a bombshell is dropped.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the season one finale, the outbreak of a sexually transmitted disease affects some hospital staff. As Meredith and Derek grow closer, a bombshell is dropped.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: The surgical interns, residents and attendings of Seattle Grace Hospital juggle increasingly complicated procedures and personal lives, while learning what it means to be a good doctor. Medical drama series starring Ellen Pompeo, Patrick Dempsey and Sandra Oh.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The surgical staff of Seattle Grace Hospital juggle complicated procedures and personal lives. Medical drama with Ellen Pompeo and Patrick Dempsey.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The surgical interns, residents and attendings of Seattle Grace Hospital juggle increasingly complicated procedures and personal lives, while learning what it means to be a good doctor. Medical drama series starring Ellen Pompeo, Patrick Dempsey and Sandra Oh.
